description:
Yhivi is the only girl who shows up to game night. For years, every time she rolls that 20-sided dice, the same group of horny men try to sneak a peak down the front of her school dress. In reality they know they could never fuck her, but what about fantasy? What if in the game they could do any kind of nasty shit they wanted?
Yhivi answers all those questions tonight! After the dungeon master casts a maddening lust spell on the entire battalion, Yhivi offers to break it by fucking the shit out of every player. Sloppy blowjobs all around for these nerds, plus face-fucking and humiliation ensue. She then offers them entry to ALL her holes and their maddening lust fills her up airtight. She takes cock after cock, draining them all into a magic chalice and drinking it down in a grand fantasy finale. This babe is a real team player!
title: From RPG to DP: Nerdy Gamer Slut Girl Fucks Her Opponents
